title: Halo Infinite Release Date Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.25.21
description:
Janet and Andy talk about Halo Infinite's leaked release date, Activision Blizzard lawsuit news, and IGN republishing its Palestine article! 

Follow Janet: https://twitter.com/Gameonysus

Time Stamps -

00:02:10 - Housekeeping
Arcade1Up Unveiled a Junior Line of Cabinets

00:02:38 - Halo Infinite December 8 release date will reportedly be announced today - The Verge

00:26:00 - IGN Republishes Its Post on Palestine - IGN / Gameindustry.biz
00:35:10 - Ad  
00:38:15 - Xcloud coming to console - The Verge
